response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your success. Given its value to you, we estimate it to be worth $1,500,000. After careful consideration, we are offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This is a unique chance to secure such a valuable asset at a price that offers considerable savings compared to its market value. We are confident that this investment will pay dividends for years to come. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 1400000}
